good: An elderly artist returns from her exhibition of paintings late at night. A few minutes after her return, a man - the killer - enters the apartment. He had the keys because he was dating the painter. He wanted to kill her with a hammer, however, he smashed the clock. Then he stabbed her with a knife. He heard the worried neighbors so he had to escape through the window. At which he lost his keys and a shoe. However, he managed to steal the painting, which was his original goal.
bad: Unfortunately, the clues collected do not allow to find the criminal.
